document_data.name: The Blackflame Curtain
document_data.mainbody: '''The Blackflame Curtain''' was a brothel in [[Suzail]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Blackflame Curtain was located in [[Suzail]].
document_data.Services: The playpretties at the brothel also did house calls.
document_data.History: Before the [[Council of the Dragon]] in {{yearlink|1479}}, [[Marlin Stormserpent]] called on his trusty [[Whelandrin]] to fetch him a playpretty from a place like The Blackflame Curtain.
